miniapp.name: LIke n Tip
miniapp.subtitle: Send tips with style!
miniapp.description: A fun and catchy way to tip your favorite Base app users with emojis and personalized messages. Perfect for group chats and showing appreciation!
miniapp.ogTitle: LIke n Tip - Catchy Tipping for Base App
miniapp.ogDescription: Send tips to your favorite Base app users with catchy messages and emojis! Perfect for group chats and social interactions.
